entities.name: room 437
entities.description: The room that Harry is trying to get into, but cannot. It is described as the 'Room of Requirement' later in the text.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that allows Harry to become invisible. It is mentioned that Harry puts it on again after leaving the corridor.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: A room that can be accessed by those who need it. It is described as a place where one can find what they need.

entities.name: madam puddifoot's teashop
entities.description: A location outside of which Ron was supposed to apparate.

entities.name: scrivenshaft's
entities.description: A location near Madam Puddifoot's teashop where Ron ended up after overshooting his apparation.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The place where Harry finds Ron and Hermione having lunch.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is mentioned as being with Hermione in the Great Hall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is mentioned as being with Ron in the Great Hall.

entities.name: harry

entities.name: malfoy
